name: Asteroids (itch) (Robley Evans)
description:
Remember that good old fashioned Asteroids game? Well I remade it because I was told to. So here it is, the basic game is much the original but I'm going to add to it regularly because I want to make it more interesting. So if you stick around, thanks a bunch and you probably won't feel the need to donate to me and that's just fine. I drew all my art for this so it looks kinda bad in that regard. I have included copies of all the unity scripts I wrote for this game so feel free to take a look at them. Have fun, feel free to criticize and kill them damn UFO's!

~Robley
